paper_abstract: The efficiency of the network flow techniques can be exploited in the solution of nonlinearly constrained network flow problems (NCNFP) by means of approximate subgradient methods (ASM). We propose to solve the dual problem by an ASM that uses a variant of the well-known constant step rule of Shor. In this work the kind of convergence of this method is analyzed and its efficiency is compared with that of other approximate subgradient methods over NCNFP.
paper_title: A variant of the constant step rule for approximate subgradient methods over nonlinear networks
